title: Federal Reserve Meeting and Major Tech Earnings to Drive Market Focus Amid Geopolitical Uncertainty
description: The Federal Reserve is expected to hold interest rates steady on Wednesday after three quarter-point cuts in 2025, while major technology companies including Apple, Microsoft, Meta, and Tesla prepare to report earnings. S&P 500 earnings are projected to grow 9.1% in Q4 and over 15% in 2026, with investors particularly focused on returns from artificial intelligence investments. Markets recovered from earlier volatility related to Greenland trade tensions, with 81% of reporting companies beating earnings estimates so far.
content: U.S. markets are preparing for a critical week as investors shift their attention from geopolitical uncertainties to key economic developments, including a Federal Reserve policy meeting and major corporate earnings announcements. The focus comes aft... [6524 chars]

title: avos delegates stress AI’s employment upside as layoff fears linger
description: At the World Economic Forum in Davos, business leaders discussed the potential of technology, specifically artificial intelligence, to create new jobs. Despite optimism, concerns were raised about the impact of AI on jobs and society. Top executives remained enthusiastic about the trillion-dollar expansion of AI, but also discussed potential negative effects.

title: Demand for agentic AI skills surges; supply falls short by over 50%: Report
description: Agentic AI is an advanced form of artificial intelligence focused on autonomous decision-making and action. Based on an analysis of more than 28,000 job postings, the report shows that Agentic AI roles are now firmly embedded within enterprise hiring, supported by the shift from GenAI pilots to production-grade autonomous workflows.

description:

title: Meta pauses teen access to AI characters
description: Meta has stopped giving teens access to artificial intelligence characters, the company wrote in a blog post Friday.
content:
Meta is halting teens’ access to artificial intelligence characters, at least temporarily, the company said in a blog post Friday.
Meta Platforms Inc., which own Instagram and WhatsApp, said that starting in the “coming weeks,” teens will no longer b... [853 chars]

title: Saturday Feeling: How AI is rewriting the script in Indian cinema
description: Artificial Intelligence has made deep inroads into Indian cinema without the audience really noticing. It's transforming the filmmaking process but are directors asking questions about the changes AI is making to the art form?
content: In a surprisingly short period of time, Artificial Intelligence has ripped into every aspect of life, business, arts, leisure, society, entertainment. Every so often, Lounge reports on the chatbots that are replacing partners, friends, family and wor... [2770 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Meta's Temporary Restriction on AI Characters for Teens
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
